summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6063 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 79, replat of West Seattle Land and improvement co's third plat, being the alley between Grayson Street and Admiral Way from 39th Avenue Southwest to Belvidere Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82938, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
